Reviews.Title: “Clean rooms & friendly staff”
Reviews.Author: Andrew C
Reviews.Content: returned week trip orlando daughter stayed motel 6 entire weeki praise facility staffthe exceptionally clean staff pleasant helpfulthis crown plaza dont expect basics honestly beat pricewe stayed moneys time feel location close numerous restaurants gift stay trip orlando

Reviews.Content: cheapest reason couple fine dingy mexican hostels unacceptable pubic hairs bed obviously cleaned food floor smelled awful moment door 7 dollars night stayed western lakeside road 2 pools own free minigolf awesome budget accommodations stay

Reviews.Title: “Very basic, but clean & served our purposes”

Reviews.Content: friend stayed motel 6 maingate west night march 31st expected rolling town late ie 2am inexpensive sleep hours shower motel fit bill perfectly rate 30 clean double beds despite late hour front desk clerk friendly efficient clean sheets fresh bathroom maintained lack amenities expensive properties shower sleep motel 6 deal exterior motel definitely werent care mile world drive access walt disney world snap vehicle couple tips theres resort fee hooray theres shampoo byo soap ac unit job cooling bit noisy earplugs idea light sleepers clean frills rate id highly recommend motel
